divs: sighting detailsearly in the morning, my grandmother was taking me to the school bus stop. we had to walk a way as we lived in the country. there were no neighbors near us. our walk was about 3\4 mile to the bus stop. there was no one else around. nana and i always watched the sky for odd things. we lived near the allentown-bethlehem-easton airport. often times we would see "fun" things like the blimp. this day was different. today there was a big thing in the sky. it was very, very high in the sky. the mares tail cirus clouds were floating in front of it. any how, this thing looked like a big community with sets of stairs or some type of tracks keeping things moving back and forth. there was smalll silver objects going back and forth. my grandmother said it was something that the russians were doing to keep us safe. this was in the sky numerous days. it made me feel very uneasy to just look at it. i had to stop looking for it. it just made me feel very nervous. it also was in the same location in the sky.
